reviews.text: The proximity of this spot to where I work made it very appealing. I fell for this restaurant instantly. Restaurant personnel offered acceptable service. The food tastes great and portions are huge. I love this place. I suggest experiencing this place.

I dont usually leave reviews but this place is easily in my top 2 or 3 restaurants in nyc. By far the best Albanian food in the city. Would 100% recommend if youre looking for quality food and service!
beautiful time here. The food was incredible. felt like home üíú

Poor service. Arrogant waiter doesn't bring any utensils to eat the food with and argues with customers when it's his own fault.
Don't recommend this restaurant to anyone.
Kind staff and pleasant ambiance

You'll feel the value in each bite. You can enjoy tasty food in pleasant surroundings. This spot benefits from its prime position. The workers delivered prompt service with warmth. Si n'shpi has earned my loyalty.

5/5 experience
Waiter was super nice and helpful.
Burek with meat..oh my gawd, so delicious. First time ever tried that albanian dish and was soo surprised. Tasted soo good, that meat was so well maintained and spiced.
Place is so cozy, clean and beautiful.
Deffinitely recommended.

If you‚Äôre looking for a place that truly feels like home, Si n‚ÄôShpi is the spot! The food tastes just like it came from a traditional Albanian kitchen ‚Äì rich, comforting, and full of flavor. I tried the tav√´ dheu and the spinach byrek, and both were absolutely delicious. The staff is incredibly welcoming and friendly, making the whole experience feel like you‚Äôre dining with family.

The atmosphere is warm, clean, and cozy ‚Äì a perfect hidden gem in Brooklyn. A little piece of Albania right here in New York. Can‚Äôt wait to go back! üá¶üá±‚ú®

Great place for Albanian food. Awesome customer service. One of my favorite places in Brooklyn.

If you want some lamb that will melt in your mouth this is the place! My partner and I cannot stop talking about how lovely their food is! To add to it, the service is phenomenal! All of the food and veggies are fresh. Taste like they just picked it from a garden!

They need to open a location in Manhattan and make it a bit more upscale with the ambiance... They'd blow the other restaurants alike out of the water for sure! People would be begging for reservations because the food and service is just that damn phenomenal!

First of all, the main course came one by one, by the time the last dish came the first 2-3 plates were done. Aecon we ordered a mix meat plate, one of the meats was old and it tasted bad, potatoes you can tell by looking at them that they were old, not fresh made, they were even cold and tasteless. Tava beans with dry meat was terrible, this is my second time, worst beans that I ever had, sorry I didn't take a pictures but also you can tell by looking at it. When I told the server, he said I'm just a waiter but I will tell them about it. No one came back to talk to us, even the water didn't say anything and we were charged for everything, including for that beans worst soup which I took only a spoon from it. WORST FOOD AND SERVICE, DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY IN THIS PLACE

These guys deserve the 5 stars. Their food is delicious every time I order it and reasonably priced. The service is phenomenal and you can tell they care about their customer. It is probably the best Albanian restaurant in New York. I‚Äôll recommend everyone to try especially their stew, it is very good.

Everything was delicious. The veal soup was flavorful. The spicy kofte was very tender. I highly recommend this place!

We went there twice already, both times it was great. The best dishes I liked: bourekas with cheese, veal with cheese, and lamb.
They also have a great option for 3 & 4 people.

It was ok. Burek with mish was the best selection. Expensive prices (Fanta exotic is $5, and orange is $4, they're the same). Bakllava was 5$ for a super small piece that barely had any taste. Tullumba was dry inside with no taste as well. Salad was pretty good though

Love you guys ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Ä¶
We went there twice and order their pizza Pice Shpije twice, it‚Äôs really tasty pairing with pickled peppers. Will definitely go there again

My family had no clue there's a growing Albanian community in this neighborhood. There were other Albanian restaurant but we chose to dine here as it seemed to be a busier restaurant. There were plenty of outdoor/covered dining tables but we decided to head indoor as it was quite packed when we're there. The restaurant do have nice decor for both dining areas.

Food: Tasty food with appropriate amount of seasoning. The spices used were mild IMO as it let the meat dishes flavor to shine by itself. The mixed meat platter was pretty good.

Service: The staff were welcoming, friendly and helped us order as we're unfamiliar with Albanian food. However, they're not too attentive with refilling empty water bottle and discarded our leftover complimentary bread which we had requested to pack together with our half eaten beef prosciutto pizza.

Ambience:  Outdoor seating area is modern and have a festive vibe. Indoor is bright, elegant with classic European designs.

Overall: Will definitely come back if I'm in the neighborhood or have out of town guests who are adventurous. Prices are reasonable too. So please go support small businesses like this.
Very delicious Albanian food!

The best Albanian food in NYC, everything they make
is üíØ % Always fresh. They have great service, they are real sweet and polite. And what‚Äôs the best part of Si N‚Äôshpi is: THIS IS A RESTAURANT THAT YOU CAN TAKE‚Ä¶

I recently spent an afternoon in NYC for a 30th birthday eating extravaganza with close (Albanian) friend and 10 others. We ended up at 3 separate Albanian restaurants sampling all of the traditional cuisine. Having spent a month in Korce‚Ä¶

My husband recently brought Burek home from this place and it was absolutely delicious!! The BEST Burek I have ever had and I‚Äôve tried a lot here and in Europe. Crispy, flaky, not greasy at all! Perfect!

Tasty food, friendly staff and nice environment!
Would recommend especially for European people that like meat and their products a lot. My favorite food in this restaurant is ‚ÄúSpeca n‚Äôgjym‚Äù, ‚ÄúFli‚Äù and ‚ÄúRibs Steaks‚Äù. We had a lunch with family and friends and they enjoyed it.

I have been to many Albanian restaurant in the past, but this place has the best authentic Albanian food. Also their service and hospitality is impeccable. Highly recommended. You will not be disappointed.
